analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol:
	Contract HoardCrowdsale has payable functions:
	 - invest (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#51-56)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

HoardPresale.maxFundLimit should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#131-134)
HoardPresale.tokenDecimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#163-164)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#13-15): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of HoardPresale. (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#183) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_freezeEndsAt' of HoardPresale. (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#183-184) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_freezeEndsAt' of HoardPresale.setFreezeEnd (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#236-237) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_crowdsale' of HoardPresale.setCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#307) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tranches' of HoardPresale.setPricing (/unique_contracts/0xc336e10dee4cab01248cf3b1747b52d78394c77a.sol#320) is not in mixedCase
